name: Donquixote Doflamingo
text: [On Play] A total of up to 3 of your opponent's rested Characters or Leaders do not become active during your opponent's next refresh phase.

effect.text: A total of up to 3 of your opponent's rested Characters or Leaders do not become active during your opponent's next refresh phase.

meta.notes: Rarity is printed as 'SP' in the top right corner. The card is a sample, indicated by the large 'SAMPLE' watermark.
